title: Self-Directed eLearning Module Design for Nursing Pathophysiology

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic nursing principles and understanding of human anatomy
context.additional_context: Learners are working professionals with time constraints during work hours, preferring self-directed learning using personal devices; classroom group collaboration and discussion sessions are conducted in parallel

learning_goals: They can explain the pathophysiological mechanisms of hematological disorders with over 80% accuracy.
They can establish nursing intervention strategies by analyzing clinical cases collected via e-learning modules.
They present pathology symptom-treatment linkage logic at least three times with peer learners in asynchronous discussion forums.

resources: Loaner Tablet PC Kit for Practical Use

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
